description: {"blocks":[{"key":"797ve","text":"Protocol for bottlenecking a variant library for downstream use in the Pooled, Growth-Based Assay pipeline using either a positive-displacement flow cytometer or basic microbial culture equipment. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"ck2c9","text":"The protocol outlined in this document was created as a part of the Pooled, Growth-Based Assays for Protein Function Measurements pipeline for Align to Innovate’s Open Dataset Initiative. Align to Innovate is a non-profit research organization operating under open science principles with the goal of improving science research with programmable experiments. The Open Datasets Initiative is working to accelerate community-driven science with the use of automated labs to pioneer robust data collection methods and curated, high-fidelity, public biological datasets amenable to machine learning. This work was supported by Align to Innovate’s Open Datasets Initiative which receives philanthropic funding in part from Griffin Catalyst.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":68,"length":61}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3bm5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Pooled, Growth-Based Assays for Protein Function Measurements

keywords: Deep mutational scanning, protein sequence-function relationships, fitness landscape, laboratory automation

cultures:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"di813","text":"glycerol stock of variant library","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2npfr","text":"Reagents:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9b72c","text":"M9 Media (ThermoFisher A1374401)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ctekl","text":"Attune Flow Cytometer Focusing Fluid (ThermoFisher 90039273)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bdjt","text":"Glycerol (MilliporeSigma G5516)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bg4ps","text":"Consumables:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgusi","text":"Six 15 mL snap cap tubes (Corning 352059)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2kstu","text":"Three 250mL baffled flasks (ThermoFisher 4116-0250)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8j6p3","text":"Three 1.5 mL Microcentrifuge tubes (ThermoFisher 69715)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cmgn7","text":"Three Agar Plates with LB and Kanamycin-50 (MilliporeSigma L0543)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71gqt","text":"Multiple 1.2 mL Cryogenic vials (Corning 430487)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bsqa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"euand","text":"Basic Microbial Equipment Materials","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8h5u6","text":"Starting cultures:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6jck","text":"glycerol stock of variant library","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"jhnp","text":"Reagents:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ashna","text":"M9 Media (ThermoFisher A1374401)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"29c4p","text":"Glycerol (MilliporeSigma G5516)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qe78","text":"Consumables:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"efr1v","text":"Six 15 mL snap cap tubes (Corning 352059)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6dj2","text":"Eight 250mL baffled flasks (ThermoFisher 4116-0250)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gcu4","text":"Eighteen 1.5 mL Microcentrifuge tubes (ThermoFisher 69715)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2l4ah","text":"Eighteen Agar Plates with LB and Kanamycin-50 (MilliporeSigma L0543)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fb5g7","text":"Multiple 1.2 mL Cryogenic vials (Corning 430487)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"25e9q","text":"Dilute a full 1 mL vial of the library glycerol stock into 50 mL of media in a 250 mL baffled flask.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e3qji","text":"One new 250-mL baffled flask with 50 mL media. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8sque","text":"This is the final flask","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":11,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5p3g","text":"Six 15 mL snap-cap culture tubes, each with 2 mL media and number the tubes 1 - 6.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9csiq","text":"Three 1.5 mL microcentrifuge tubes and number the tubes 1, 2, 3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d412v","text":"Leave tube no. 1 empty","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2hmhu","text":"Add 900 uL media to each of the other tubes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4i31h","text":"Three agar plates (with LB + kan) and number the plates 1, 2, 3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"990jf","text":"Prepare one baffled flask (125 mL or 250 mL) with 49.9 mL media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejfam","text":"This is the dilution flask","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"574q2","text":"Incubate the resulting culture at 37 C with shaking (300 rpm) for 12 - 24 hours (to reach stationary phase).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3puj","text":"This generates the overnight flask","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

cases.title: Flow Cytometer
cases.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"f31t2","text":"This protocol uses a flow cytometer to bottleneck variant libraries down to the desired size to run in the Pooled, Growth-Based Assay Protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

cases.title: Basic Microbial Culture Equipment
cases.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"83tq8","text":"This protocol uses only basic microbial culture equipment to bottleneck variant libraries down to the desired size to run in the Pooled, Growth-Based Assay Protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1pr9s","text":"Run the startup and performance test protocols for the flow cytometer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9l2mj","text":"Also, run a blank sample, 1 mL of focusing fluid to make sure the system is well warmed up and running properly. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5kuvj","text":"Mix the 50 mL overnight culture well, then pipette 0.1 mL from the overnight flask culture into the dilution flask (with 49.9 mL media) and swirl the flask to mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":63,"length":19},{"style":"bold","offset":100,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"corpk","text":"Make a 3-fold serial dilution series from the dilution flask:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":46,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4837v","text":"Pipette 1 mL from extra flask to culture tube no. 1","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1h303","text":"Mix culture tube no. 1 well","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1am3","text":"Pipette 1 mL from culture tube no. 1 to culture tube no. 2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nsn5","text":"Mix culture tube no. 2 well","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8tnoc","text":"Pipette 1 mL from culture tube no. 2 to culture tube no. 3","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ji9a","text":"Mix culture tube no. 3 well","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"259a0","text":"Continue this for the remaining tubes 4-6.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4lrod","text":"Measure a media blank sample with the flow cytometer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31dq8","text":"Use a 150 uL acquisition volume at 100 uL/min flow rate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fj3b3","text":"Measure cultures tubes 1-6 with the flow cytometer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8q8q2","text":"Mix each tube well by vortexing before measurement.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qq3v","text":"Measure tubes in reverse order (i.e., start with tube 6).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8p322","text":"Use a 150 uL acquisition volume at 100 uL/min flow rate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9edoq","text":"For the media blank and each culture tube, analyze the cytometry data to calculate the apparent number of cells per 100 uL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ctrf","text":"Ignore the first 30 s of data for each sample","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2lrjq","text":"Adjust the flow cytometry gates based on the scattering signals for the culture tube samples, and use the same gate for all samples (including the media blank)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"djp1d","text":"Record the “raw cell count” as the number of events within the scattering-signal gate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"66h8v","text":"For the culture tube samples, subtract the number of events recorded with the media blank sample to calculate the number of cells per 100 uL for each sample ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4dbcm","text":"Choose the culture tube with closest to 20,000 cells per 100 uL. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7pv4r","text":"Calculate the volume of the chosen culture required for 200,000 cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7u1to","text":"This is the input volume","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1b9v4","text":"200,000 is used here instead of 100,000 because some variants will have multiple copies in the culture. So, the counted number of cells will be an overestimate of the resulting bottleneck diversity.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5fg1","text":"Add the input volume of the chosen culture to the final 250-mL baffled flask with 50 mL media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":8,"length":12},{"style":"bold","offset":49,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ahiuu","text":"Pipette 1 mL from the final flask to microcentrifuge tube 1 (the empty one).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"90fal","text":"Pipette 100 uL from microcentrifuge tube 1 to microcentrifuge tube 2 and mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1krid","text":"Mix microcentrifuge tube 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ibhk","text":"Pipette 100 uL from microcentrifuge tube 2 to microcentrifuge tube 3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cdnhr","text":"Mix microcentrifuge tube 3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7imm8","text":"Plate 150 uL from each microcentrifuge tube onto the corresponding agar plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2j4ss","text":"Incubate the bottlenecked culture in the final 250 mL baffled flask at 37 C with shaking (300 rpm) for 16 - 24 hours (to reach stationary phase).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":41,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Count cultures to verify flow cytometry data
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1g4vj","text":"The following day, count the number of colonies on each plate and use the results to estimate the number of cells that were initially diluted into the bottlenecked culture.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9htrp","text":"Make several 1 mL glycerol stocks (0.5 mL cells + 0.5 mL 40% glycerol) from the bottlenecked culture, label appropriately, and store at -80C until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bvgcb","text":"Mix microcentrifuge tube 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4hvem","text":"Mix the final flask by swirling several times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":8,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5p3g","text":"Prepare one baffled flask (125 mL or 250 mL) with 49.9 mL media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aruk7","text":"This is the dilution flask","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cgq24","text":"Prepare six 15 mL snap-cap culture tubes, each with 2 mL media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9d8ef","text":"Number the tubes 1 - 6","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"990jf","text":"Prepare six new 250-mL baffled flasks, each with 50 mL media. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"37khu","text":"Number the flasks 1 - 6","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e3qji","text":"Prepare 18 1.5 mL microcentrifuge tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehgn0","text":"Number the tubes 1.1, 1.2, 1.3, 2.1, 2.2, 2.3, …, 6.1, 6.2, 6.3","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e70ka","text":"Leave tubes 1.1, 2.1, 3.1, …, 6.1 empty","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gn3m","text":"Add 900 uL media to each of the other tubes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dmr8g","text":"Prepare 18 agar plates (with LB + kan)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ci57","text":"Number the plates to match the microcentrifuge tubes (1.1, 1.2, 1.3, 2.1, 2.2, 2.3, …, 6.1, 6.2, 6.3)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"92sil","text":"Mix the 50 mL overnight flask well, then pipette 0.1 mL of the extra culture into the dilution flask (with 49.9 mL media).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":15},{"style":"bold","offset":86,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3pf6o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4blgv","text":"Swirl the dilution flask to mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":10,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"corpk","text":"Make a serial dilution series from the dilution flask into culture tubes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":39,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4837v","text":"Pipette 1 mL from dilution flask to culture tube no. 1","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":18,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1h303","text":"Mix culture tube no. 1 well","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1am3","text":"Pipette 1 mL from culture tube no. 1 to culture tube no. 2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nsn5","text":"Mix culture tube no. 2 well","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8tnoc","text":"Pipette 1 mL from culture tube no. 2 to culture tube no. 3","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ji9a","text":"Mix culture tube no. 3 well","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"259a0","text":"Continue this for the remaining tubes 4-6.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e23m6","text":"Transfer 1 mL of each culture from tubes 1-6 to flasks 1-6 and microcentrifuge tubes 1-6 :","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a39i9","text":"Mix well","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjfkl","text":"Pipette 1 mL from each culture tube to corresponding baffled flask ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"276ga","text":"Mix baffled flask well","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cle1j","text":"Pipette 1 mL from flask to corresponding empty microcentrifuge tube (X.1)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6niev","text":"For each set of microcentrifuge tubes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bt01j","text":"Mix microcentrifuge tube X.1","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8hqe","text":"Pipette 100 uL from tube X.1 to tube X.2 ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f2ch7","text":"Mix microcentrifuge tube X.2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8s1ic","text":"Pipette 100 uL from tube X.2 to tube X.2 ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bkji0","text":"Mix microcentrifuge tube X.2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fj8ss","text":"Pipette 100 uL from tube X.2 to tube X.3 ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3p1pv","text":"Mix microcentrifuge tube X.3","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5fg1","text":"Plate 150 uL from each microcentrifuge tube onto the corresponding agar plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"edd0q","text":"Incubate all agar plates at 37 C for 16-24 hours or until colonies are visible and incubate all flasks at 37 C with shaking (300 rpm) for 16-24 hours (to stationary phase)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Count colonies and estimate colony forming units
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c8737","text":"The next day, count the colonies on every agar plate to get colony forming unit (CFU) estimates for the starting point for each culture.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Count colonies and estimate colony forming units
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2vfcq","text":"Choose the culture with an estimated starting CFU count closest to the target diversity (100,000).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f8nb8","text":"The true CFU count should be an overestimate of the library diversity because some variants will have multiple copies in the culture. But in our experience, the diversity resulting from this method is just as likely to be higher or lower than the estimated CFU count.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6rt9h","text":"Make several 1 mL glycerol stocks (0.5 mL cells + 0.5 mL 40% glycerol) from the chosen bottlenecked culture, label appropriately, and store at -80 C until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68rp4","text":"Also, consider making glycerol stocks from some of the other bottlenecked cultures in case you decide to run a similar library with higher or lower diversity after the initial pilot-scale pooled assay.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Library Bottlenecking Protocols

versions.title: Library Bottlenecking Protocol (Basic Microbial Culture Equipment)
versions.title_html: Library Bottlenecking Protocol (Basic Microbial Culture Equipment)
